Element.Text: (flexor response: internal rotation of shoulder, flexion of forearm and wrist with clenched fist, leg extension, plantarflexion of foot)

Element.Name: 运动反应

Element.Text: （extensor response: adduction of arm, internal rotation of shoulder, pronation of forearm and extension at elbow, flexion of wrist and fingers, leg extension, plantarflexion of foot）

Info.ID: 标准评定量表\格拉斯哥昏迷评分量表

XTextDocument.BodyText: Item Condition Score Eye response ○4 Points Eye opening spontaneously ○3 Points Eye opening to speech ○2 points Eye opening in response to pain stimulus ○1 point Eye opening in response to pain stimulus Motor reponse ○6 points Obey easy commands ○5 points Localize to pain ○4 points Withdrawal from pain ○3 points Decorticate posturing accentuated by pain (flexor response: internal rotation of shoulder, flexion of forearm and wrist with clenched fist, leg extension, plantarflexion of foot) ○2 points Decorticate posturing accentuated by pain （extensor response: adduction of arm, internal rotation of shoulder, pronation of forearm and extension at elbow, flexion of wrist and fingers, leg extension, plantarflexion of foot） ○1 point No motor response Verbal response ○5 points Oriented ○4 points Confused ○3 points Inappropriate words ○2 points Incomprehensible sounds ○1 point No verbal response Total： 0 Function condition： Note：The total scores are from 3 points to 15 points： Severe, GCS≤8 Moderate, GCS 9-11 Minor, GCS≥12 Coma, GCS≤8; No coma, GCS≥9 The lower values indicate severer conditions.
